alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:45PM EDT until July 02 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wayne County in east central Indiana... Fayette County in east central Indiana... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 445 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of New Castle to 6 miles southwest of Rushville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Connersville, Cambridge City, Hagerstown, Dublin, Glenwood, Franklin, Waterloo, Bunker Hill, Greens Fork, East Germantown, Economy, Mount Auburn, Alquina, Mettel Field, Jacksonburg, Bentonville, Beesons, Springersville and Falmouth. This includes I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
